heading: HR00188
0: A RESOLUTION URGING THE PHILIPPINE NATIONAL POLICE (PNP) TO IMMEDIATELY INSTITUTE MEASURES AND INTENSIFY VIGILANCE AND POLICE VISIBILITY TO CURTAIL LAWLESSNESS AND SPATE OF RANDOM KILLINGS AROUND THE NATION
